import { useContext } from "react" import { ShopContext } from "../Context/ShopContext" export const Values = ( {CEP, } ) =>{ const { priceProducts } = useContext(ShopContext) let percentual = 0.10; let aumento = priceProducts * percentual; let novoPreco = priceProducts - aumento; return(

Total

R$: {priceProducts}

R$: {novoPreco}

Valor com 10% de desconto no Boleto ou PIX

) }
